body.name: Montessori Toys for Toddlers, Children Race Track Toy with 4 Cars and 1 Wooden Parking Lot, Stable Base, Car Ramp Toy for 2 3 Year Old Boy Girl Gifts
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 48 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 27 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 🚕Montessori Toys for 2-3 Year Old: This toddler ramp race track toy with 4 toy cars, 1 parking lot and rainbow race track, no assembly required. The little ramp racer put the car on the top track and let go. Kids will focus on watching the car driving on the track, encourage the development of 2 year old boy and girl’s hand-eye coordination, and improve their visual tracking ability.

🚕Car Ramp Race Track Toy: Made of premium natural wood, smooth surface and no burrs, gentle to your kid’s hands. Race cars will slide out of the rainbow race track and park in the wooden parking lot at the bottom to prevent cars from running around and getting lost. The wooden parking lot also can enhance their storage awareness.

🚕Preschool Educational Toys: This car toy for toddlers 2 3 is designed to stimulate imagination, stimulate exploration and encourage children's natural curiosity. It’s a development toys for a kids such as 2 year old boy and girl that can exercise their hand-eye coordination, concentration, communication, cooperation and fine motor skills.

🚕Safe and Durable: For the safety of children , our race car tracks are made of high-quality materials, BPA free, stained with non-toxic water-based paint. The race cars will not fall apart without violent damage, and is big enough for toddlers, there is no need to worry about the danger of falling off and suffocation.

🚕Perfect Gifts for Toddlers: The wooden car ramp toys is suitable for children to play indoors or outdoors. Packed in a very sturdy colorful box, the cute toddler toy is a perfect choice for a birthday gift for 2 3 year old boys girls! It's also a great toy for a family to play together to enjoy parent-child time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Children Race Track Toy Bring the fun of racing for kids. Playing with parents will be more fun!

Unique Car Race Games 4 ramp racer of this toddler toy start off from the top and each car flips at the end of a ramp to continue to the next, providing fascinating continuous motion for dynamic playtime. Material: The hull, track, parking lot and base are all wooden parts.The wheels and tracks are plastic.
Details Wooden Car Ramp Dimensions: 14.2" x 3.5" x 10.2"Car Size: 1.2" x 1.6"Package includes: 1 x Parking Lot，4 x Bright Mini Racers，4 x Bright Ramp Tracks

Safe Design The wheels of the car are sturdy and easy to play, making it a lot of fun for young children. Great wooden car toy for toddlers. Detail Design There are obstacles on the edge of the track to prevent the trolley from rushing out and prevent accidents.

Easy to Store There is a wooden parking lot at the bottom. The cars slides down the track and will eventually stop there. Not only is it real and interesting, but it also makes storage more convenient. Smooth Edge This toddler track toy is sturdy and durable with smooth, burr-free edges for toddlers to play at home or outdoors.

Learn Colors Comes with four bright-colored cars of different colors, which can help children recognize colors, and the size is also very suitable for children. Great Gift for Kids Perfect for your kids as Christmas/Birthday/Easter/Halloween/New Years gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple toy encouraging individual play
reviews.reviewText: Our 18-month-old received the Montessori Race Track Toy as a gift, and it has quickly become a favorite in our household. This toy not only captivates her attention but also provides an engaging way to learn about chain reactions.One of the standout features of this race track toy is its design that encourages interactive play. Our little one loves taking the cars from the bottom, placing them on top, and eagerly tracking their journey as they race back and forth. The simplicity of this activity brings joy to her playtime while subtly introducing the concept of cause and effect.The Montessori approach embedded in this toy is evident in its ability to promote independent exploration and learning. The bright colors and smooth design make it easy for our toddler to interact with the toy on her own, fostering a sense of independence and accomplishment.Moreover, the race track toy provides a delightful way for our child to enhance her fine motor skills as she places and moves the cars. It's a multifaceted toy that seamlessly combines entertainment and education.In conclusion, the Montessori Race Track Toy has proven to be a wonderful addition to our child's playtime. Its ability to entertain and educate through simple yet effective chain reaction activities makes it a standout choice for parents seeking engaging and developmental toys for their little ones.Happy racing and learning!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Someone forgot to include cars, but company made it right!
reviews.reviewText: There were no cars with it. I returned it. The company made it right. They sent out a new one, with cars. Their response was immediate. The toy, I give 4 stars, as it is small, but works well. The company, I give 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of his favorite toys
reviews.reviewText: This was one of my grandson's favorite toys. He and I could not stop racing them, Its fun to try and keep them going! It doesn't take up much space and fits easily in any playpin. The car are sturdy build and can run down the track front facing or back facing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute toy, she loved it.
reviews.reviewText: An inexpensive toy to be used for a very short time. The cars slide down easily. Not a solid toy but I wasn't expecting it to be. Non battery operated!!! So rare for a toy nowadays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My 2 year old loves this!!
reviews.reviewText: My son got this for Christmas and loves it!! He plays with it daily!! Great quality and lots of fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gift for my 18 months old grandson
reviews.reviewText: Very simple toy, but very entertaining! My grandson is 18 months old and this was (one of) my Christmas gifts. He watches the cars going down the ramps and laughs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: The cars are very small, my son can put them in his mouth easily. Makes me very nervous, I would only recommended for an older toddler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Toddler Toy!
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this for my 12mo old for Christmas. It has kept him quite entertained! It’s a simple enough design for him to use even at a young age. My 2.5 year old loves it as well! It is very high quality! Very happy with purchase!
